name: UNKNOWN_SERVER_ERROR
message: The server experienced an unexpected error when processing the request.

name: NONE
message: NONE

name: OFFSET_OUT_OF_RANGE
message: The requested offset is not within the range of offsets maintained by the server.

name: CORRUPT_MESSAGE
message: This message has failed its CRC checksum, exceeds the valid size, has a null key for a compacted topic, or is otherwise corrupt.

name: UNKNOWN_TOPIC_OR_PARTITION
message: This server does not host this topic-partition.

name: INVALID_FETCH_SIZE
message: The requested fetch size is invalid.

name: LEADER_NOT_AVAILABLE
message: There is no leader for this topic-partition as we are in the middle of a leadership election.

name: NOT_LEADER_OR_FOLLOWER
message: For requests intended only for the leader, this error indicates that the broker is not the current leader. For requests intended for any replica, this error indicates that the broker is not a replica of the topic partition.

name: REQUEST_TIMED_OUT
message: The request timed out.

name: BROKER_NOT_AVAILABLE
message: The broker is not available.

name: REPLICA_NOT_AVAILABLE
message: The replica is not available for the requested topic-partition. Produce/Fetch requests and other requests intended only for the leader or follower return NOT_LEADER_OR_FOLLOWER if the broker is not a replica of the topic-partition.

name: MESSAGE_TOO_LARGE
message: The request included a message larger than the max message size the server will accept.

name: STALE_CONTROLLER_EPOCH
message: The controller moved to another broker.

name: OFFSET_METADATA_TOO_LARGE
message: The metadata field of the offset request was too large.

name: NETWORK_EXCEPTION
message: The server disconnected before a response was received.

name: COORDINATOR_LOAD_IN_PROGRESS
message: The coordinator is loading and hence can't process requests.

name: COORDINATOR_NOT_AVAILABLE
message: The coordinator is not available.

name: NOT_COORDINATOR
message: This is not the correct coordinator.

name: INVALID_TOPIC_EXCEPTION
message: The request attempted to perform an operation on an invalid topic.

name: RECORD_LIST_TOO_LARGE
message: The request included message batch larger than the configured segment size on the server.

name: NOT_ENOUGH_REPLICAS
message: Messages are rejected since there are fewer in-sync replicas than required.

name: NOT_ENOUGH_REPLICAS_AFTER_APPEND
message: Messages are written to the log, but to fewer in-sync replicas than required.

name: INVALID_REQUIRED_ACKS
message: Produce request specified an invalid value for required acks.

name: ILLEGAL_GENERATION
message: Specified group generation id is not valid.

name: INCONSISTENT_GROUP_PROTOCOL
message: The group member's supported protocols are incompatible with those of existing members or first group member tried to join with empty protocol type or empty protocol list.

name: INVALID_GROUP_ID
message: The configured groupId is invalid.

name: UNKNOWN_MEMBER_ID
message: The coordinator is not aware of this member.

name: INVALID_SESSION_TIMEOUT
message: The session timeout is not within the range allowed by the broker (as configured by group.min.session.timeout.ms and group.max.session.timeout.ms).

name: REBALANCE_IN_PROGRESS
message: The group is rebalancing, so a rejoin is needed.

name: INVALID_COMMIT_OFFSET_SIZE
message: The committing offset data size is not valid.

name: TOPIC_AUTHORIZATION_FAILED
message: Topic authorization failed.

name: GROUP_AUTHORIZATION_FAILED
message: Group authorization failed.

name: CLUSTER_AUTHORIZATION_FAILED
message: Cluster authorization failed.

name: INVALID_TIMESTAMP
message: The timestamp of the message is out of acceptable range.

name: UNSUPPORTED_SASL_MECHANISM
message: The broker does not support the requested SASL mechanism.

name: ILLEGAL_SASL_STATE
message: Request is not valid given the current SASL state.

name: UNSUPPORTED_VERSION
message: The version of API is not supported.

name: TOPIC_ALREADY_EXISTS
message: Topic with this name already exists.

name: INVALID_PARTITIONS
message: Number of partitions is below 1.

name: INVALID_REPLICATION_FACTOR
message: Replication factor is below 1 or larger than the number of available brokers.

name: INVALID_REPLICA_ASSIGNMENT
message: Replica assignment is invalid.

name: INVALID_CONFIG
message: Configuration is invalid.

name: NOT_CONTROLLER
message: This is not the correct controller for this cluster.

name: INVALID_REQUEST
message: This most likely occurs because of a request being malformed by the client library or the message was sent to an incompatible broker. See the broker logs for more details.

name: UNSUPPORTED_FOR_MESSAGE_FORMAT
message: The message format version on the broker does not support the request.

name: POLICY_VIOLATION
message: Request parameters do not satisfy the configured policy.

name: OUT_OF_ORDER_SEQUENCE_NUMBER
message: The broker received an out of order sequence number.

name: DUPLICATE_SEQUENCE_NUMBER
message: The broker received a duplicate sequence number.

name: INVALID_PRODUCER_EPOCH
message: Producer attempted to produce with an old epoch.

name: INVALID_TXN_STATE
message: The producer attempted a transactional operation in an invalid state.

name: INVALID_PRODUCER_ID_MAPPING
message: The producer attempted to use a producer id which is not currently assigned to its transactional id.

name: INVALID_TRANSACTION_TIMEOUT
message: The transaction timeout is larger than the maximum value allowed by the broker (as configured by transaction.max.timeout.ms).

name: CONCURRENT_TRANSACTIONS
message: The producer attempted to update a transaction while another concurrent operation on the same transaction was ongoing.

name: TRANSACTION_COORDINATOR_FENCED
message: Indicates that the transaction coordinator sending a WriteTxnMarker is no longer the current coordinator for a given producer.

name: TRANSACTIONAL_ID_AUTHORIZATION_FAILED
message: Transactional Id authorization failed.

name: SECURITY_DISABLED
message: Security features are disabled.

name: OPERATION_NOT_ATTEMPTED
message: The broker did not attempt to execute this operation. This may happen for batched RPCs where some operations in the batch failed, causing the broker to respond without trying the rest.

name: KAFKA_STORAGE_ERROR
message: Disk error when trying to access log file on the disk.

name: LOG_DIR_NOT_FOUND
message: The user-specified log directory is not found in the broker config.

name: SASL_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED
message: SASL Authentication failed.

name: UNKNOWN_PRODUCER_ID
message: This exception is raised by the broker if it could not locate the producer metadata associated with the producerId in question. This could happen if, for instance, the producer's records were deleted because their retention time had elapsed. Once the last records of the producerId are removed, the producer's metadata is removed from the broker, and future appends by the producer will return this exception.

name: REASSIGNMENT_IN_PROGRESS
message: A partition reassignment is in progress.

name: DELEGATION_TOKEN_AUTH_DISABLED
message: Delegation Token feature is not enabled.

name: DELEGATION_TOKEN_NOT_FOUND
message: Delegation Token is not found on server.

name: DELEGATION_TOKEN_OWNER_MISMATCH
message: Specified Principal is not valid Owner/Renewer.

name: DELEGATION_TOKEN_REQUEST_NOT_ALLOWED
message: Delegation Token requests are not allowed on PLAINTEXT/1-way SSL channels and on delegation token authenticated channels.

name: DELEGATION_TOKEN_AUTHORIZATION_FAILED
message: Delegation Token authorization failed.

name: DELEGATION_TOKEN_EXPIRED
message: Delegation Token is expired.

name: INVALID_PRINCIPAL_TYPE
message: Supplied principalType is not supported.

name: NON_EMPTY_GROUP
message: The group is not empty.

name: GROUP_ID_NOT_FOUND
message: The group id does not exist.

name: FETCH_SESSION_ID_NOT_FOUND
message: The fetch session ID was not found.

name: INVALID_FETCH_SESSION_EPOCH
message: The fetch session epoch is invalid.

name: LISTENER_NOT_FOUND
message: There is no listener on the leader broker that matches the listener on which metadata request was processed.

name: TOPIC_DELETION_DISABLED
message: Topic deletion is disabled.

name: FENCED_LEADER_EPOCH
message: The leader epoch in the request is older than the epoch on the broker.

name: UNKNOWN_LEADER_EPOCH
message: The leader epoch in the request is newer than the epoch on the broker.

name: UNSUPPORTED_COMPRESSION_TYPE
message: The requesting client does not support the compression type of given partition.

name: STALE_BROKER_EPOCH
message: Broker epoch has changed.

name: OFFSET_NOT_AVAILABLE
message: The leader high watermark has not caught up from a recent leader election so the offsets cannot be guaranteed to be monotonically increasing.

name: MEMBER_ID_REQUIRED
message: The group member needs to have a valid member id before actually entering a consumer group.

name: PREFERRED_LEADER_NOT_AVAILABLE
message: The preferred leader was not available.

name: GROUP_MAX_SIZE_REACHED
message: The consumer group has reached its max size.

name: FENCED_INSTANCE_ID
message: The broker rejected this static consumer since another consumer with the same group.instance.id has registered with a different member.id.

name: ELIGIBLE_LEADERS_NOT_AVAILABLE
message: Eligible topic partition leaders are not available.

name: ELECTION_NOT_NEEDED
message: Leader election not needed for topic partition.

name: NO_REASSIGNMENT_IN_PROGRESS
message: No partition reassignment is in progress.

name: GROUP_SUBSCRIBED_TO_TOPIC
message: Deleting offsets of a topic is forbidden while the consumer group is actively subscribed to it.

name: INVALID_RECORD
message: This record has failed the validation on broker and hence will be rejected.

name: UNSTABLE_OFFSET_COMMIT
message: There are unstable offsets that need to be cleared.

name: THROTTLING_QUOTA_EXCEEDED
message: The throttling quota has been exceeded.

name: PRODUCER_FENCED
message: There is a newer producer with the same transactionalId which fences the current one.

name: RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
message: A request illegally referred to a resource that does not exist.

name: DUPLICATE_RESOURCE
message: A request illegally referred to the same resource twice.

name: UNACCEPTABLE_CREDENTIAL
message: Requested credential would not meet criteria for acceptability.

name: INCONSISTENT_VOTER_SET
message: Indicates that the either the sender or recipient of a voter-only request is not one of the expected voters

name: INVALID_UPDATE_VERSION
message: The given update version was invalid.

name: FEATURE_UPDATE_FAILED
message: Unable to update finalized features due to an unexpected server error.

name: PRINCIPAL_DESERIALIZATION_FAILURE
message: Request principal deserialization failed during forwarding. This indicates an internal error on the broker cluster security setup.

name: SNAPSHOT_NOT_FOUND
message: Requested snapshot was not found

name: POSITION_OUT_OF_RANGE
message: Requested position is not greater than or equal to zero, and less than the size of the snapshot.

name: UNKNOWN_TOPIC_ID
message: This server does not host this topic ID.

name: DUPLICATE_BROKER_REGISTRATION
message: This broker ID is already in use.

name: BROKER_ID_NOT_REGISTERED
message: The given broker ID was not registered.

name: INCONSISTENT_TOPIC_ID
message: The log's topic ID did not match the topic ID in the request

name: INCONSISTENT_CLUSTER_ID
message: The clusterId in the request does not match that found on the server

name: TRANSACTIONAL_ID_NOT_FOUND
message: The transactionalId could not be found

name: FETCH_SESSION_TOPIC_ID_ERROR
message: The fetch session encountered inconsistent topic ID usage

name: INELIGIBLE_REPLICA
message: The new ISR contains at least one ineligible replica.

name: NEW_LEADER_ELECTED
message: The AlterPartition request successfully updated the partition state but the leader has changed.

name: OFFSET_MOVED_TO_TIERED_STORAGE
message: The requested offset is moved to tiered storage.

name: FENCED_MEMBER_EPOCH
message: The member epoch is fenced by the group coordinator. The member must abandon all its partitions and rejoin.

name: UNRELEASED_INSTANCE_ID
message: The instance ID is still used by another member in the consumer group. That member must leave first.

name: UNSUPPORTED_ASSIGNOR
message: The assignor or its version range is not supported by the consumer group.

name: STALE_MEMBER_EPOCH
message: The member epoch is stale. The member must retry after receiving its updated member epoch via the ConsumerGroupHeartbeat API.

name: MISMATCHED_ENDPOINT_TYPE
message: The request was sent to an endpoint of the wrong type.

name: UNSUPPORTED_ENDPOINT_TYPE
message: This endpoint type is not supported yet.

name: UNKNOWN_CONTROLLER_ID
message: This controller ID is not known.

name: UNKNOWN_SUBSCRIPTION_ID
message: Client sent a push telemetry request with an invalid or outdated subscription ID.

name: TELEMETRY_TOO_LARGE
message: Client sent a push telemetry request larger than the maximum size the broker will accept.

name: INVALID_REGISTRATION
message: The controller has considered the broker registration to be invalid.
